name: Kawaii SIAM UB
description: Customized 'Sistem Informasi Akademik Mahasiswa Universitas Brawijaya' site, featuring characters from Nagi no Asukara series. Applies to: https://siam.ub.ac.id/*
additional_info: READ BEFORE INSTALL: * This theme is absolutely FREE, can freely be copied, and modified. * Also, you may print it and eat it together with your girlfriend (2D or 3D), * burn it in bizarre rituals, or put it in the middle of Transmutation circle * as a tribute to summon some loli dragons, * * or whatever. * * I don't give a fvck, as long as you leave my name and email AS IT IS when distributing it. * * * Originally created by Kuchienkz.(a.k.a wahyu darkflame) * Email: wahyu.darkflame@gmail.com * * Also.... * * I am not responsible for any loss, dead RAM, or whatever problem you faced after installing this theme. * Install it with your own risk! * If you point a finger at me for messing up your life, I will laugh at you. Hard. CREDITS: - Backgrouund illustration by DomotoLain - SIAM UB by TIK UB - Did i forgot to mention You? Tell me!
